{"query":"query PublishedCohortLibraryGetAll {
    PublishedCohortLibraryGetAll {
        authors
        clinicalAtRiskGroupsText
        id
        commissioner
        demographicsText
        description
        disclaimerText
        fixedDateReference
        name
        purpose
        shortName
        summary
        urlSlug
    }
}"
}
